english.segment2: I run for dear life to You My God. I'll never live to regret it. Do what You do so well. And Get me out of this mess and up on my feet
english.segment3: You are my Salvation. You are my Fortress. You are my Salvation. In whom I trust
english.segment4: Put Your ear to the ground and listen. Give me space for salvation. Be a guest room where I can retreat. You said Your door is always open
english.segment5: My God, free me from the grip of the wicked. From the clutch of the bad and the bully
english.segment6: You are my Salvation. You are my Fortress. You are my Salvation. In whom I trust
